title: Flight Simulator 2020- MSFS Update - Famous Flyer 9 - Douglas C 47D skytrain & WACO CG 4A
description:
Today 80 years ago it was D-Day. Microsoft and Asobo decided to honor this day by releasing an airplane bundle which includes two aircrafts which were heavily used in that time: Douglas C-47D skytrain and the WACO CG 4A. The C-47D is based on the DC-3 from Douglas but was specifically developed as a military aircraft. The WACO CG 4A is a special glider which can be pulled in the air using the Douglas C-47D. However it is not a normal flyer because it can both be used to transport people as well as cargo.
